oai_dc:dc.dc:title: MYTH AND REALITY:ORGANIC VS NON-ORGANIC
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Azeez, Ms G
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This report examines some of the key issues around organic food and its production. It takes up the challenge of answering the critics - critics who range from companies defending agri-business, through to the heads of national food authorities and some academics. It exposes the misleading and erroneous statements made against organic food, and provides the facts that proves them wrong.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Azeez, Ms G (2001) MYTH AND REALITY:ORGANIC VS NON-ORGANIC. Soil Association.
